You: "Alice was killed, so the mafia is clearly among us. I think we should look carefully at who seems most eager to push suspicion on others."

Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
You: "Diana is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Charlie last night - he's innocent. Diana is trying to frame me to protect herself."
Charlie: "I believe Diana's claim is too convenient and contradicts Bob's statement. We have to consider who benefits from this confusion before deciding."
Diana: "Bob is lying. I am the detective and my investigation clearly shows he is mafia. Charlie, trust me - we must vote Bob out to win."
